sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:bound_moiety: FLP recombinase from the Saccharomyces cerevisiae 2u plasmid
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: supports FLP-mediated excision but not integration (Turan and Bode, 2011)

lox66
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox66
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Right element (RE) mutant of loxP (Araki et al., 2010). Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GCATACAT).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: hSyn promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: hSyn promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: human synapsin I promoter; confers neuron-specific expression (Kugler et al., 2003)
